title: June Group Ride Giveaway: A TITANIUM Chris King 1 1/8″ NoThreadSet
content:
Your hard-earned money goes to supporting our independent Reportage. In doing so, you support this website’s staff and gain access to our industry-leading, private reselling platform, the Rad Bazaar!

Check this post out for all the information on how to join Group Ride for $6.66/month or $69.69/year.

SIGN UP HERE.

There are some components you build a dream bike around, and you’re lookin’ at one of them. The Chris King Titanium line is a highly sought-after piece of US-machined componentry, and for June’s Group Ride giveaway, the team at Chris King is offering a TITANIUM 1 1/8″ NoThreadSet up to one lucky Group Ride subscriber!

Sign up by June 30th to be entered to win!

Congrats to Blake for winning the Yoshimura Chilao SS Pedals!

The post June Group Ride Giveaway: A TITANIUM Chris King 1 1/8″ NoThreadSet appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
